committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution to recognize the contribution of Bernardo de Galvez to the independence of the United States, and the role of the Order of Granaderos de Galvez.

summary.text: Recognizes the contribution of Bernardo de Galvez to the independence of the United States and the role of the Order of Granaderos de Galvez in commemorating that contribution.

titles.title: A resolution to recognize the contribution of Bernardo de Galvez to the independence of the United States, and the role of the Order of Granaderos de Galvez.
